General.Name: ViviCells International Inc
General.Description: ViviCells International, Inc. operates as a stem cell preservation company. ViviCells International, Inc. was formerly known as Tropical Beverage Inc. and changed its name to ViviCells International, Inc. in May 2008. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Evanston, Illinois.
General.Address: 2142 Ashland Avenue, Evanston, IL, United States, 60201
